component.name: OpenModelica
component.summary: Open-source Modelica-based modeling and simulation environment

description.p: OpenModelica is an open-source Modelica-based modeling and simulation environment intended for industrial and academic usage. The goal with the OpenModelica effort is to create a comprehensive Open Source Modelica modeling, compilation and simulation environment based on free software distributed in binary and source code form for research, teaching, and industrial usage. We invite researchers and students, or any interested developer to participate in the project and cooperate around OpenModelica, tools, and applications.
